long_description: A high-precision, incredibly lightweight dream ride for racers and serious cyclists, the Scott Addict 10 road bike combines top-notch Shimano Ultegra parts with a carbon race frame. Carbon fiber frame and fork are precision engineered to be the lightest, strongest and most durable they can be; bike weighs approximately 15.6 lbs. With an intuitive design and light weight, Shimano Ultegra derailleurs and shifters offer very precise, dependable shifts throughout the 22 gear combinations. Tapered head tube adds structural integrity to the frameset without overdoing it. Oversize bottom bracket shell design increases stiffness for improved power transfer. Pedals sold separately. Scott Addict 10 bike specs are subject to change.
